amendment.description: At the end of title II (before the short title), add the following new section: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section pertaining to the authorization for additional Moving to Work Demonstration agreements.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Miller, Gary amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
